entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Going back using 'Shell.Current.GoToAsync("..")' causes a crash, but only when using a Mouse on an Android. #19461
  • Shell.NavBarHasShadow not working correctly on Android #19458
  • FontFamily is Not Recognized in UnPackaged WinUI App #19457
  • maui 8.0 app not run. #19456
  • problem as i change the first thing #19455

Closed

  • In Android, adding views in SizeChanged event does not show the newly added views #19391
    Backlog
  • Cannot find `ShellHandler` under `Microsoft.Maui.Handlers` #16424
  • 建个独立开发者技术交流群，欢迎大佬加入 #19460
  • [Android] Entry clear button requires tap to the right of appearance #18803
    Triaged
  • [regression/7.0.0] Entry clear button doesn't work under Android 13 + NET 7.0 #17453
    Under Consideration
  • If Listview IsEnabled is false, items are still enabled #6581
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] ZIndex + ScrollView issue #19423
  • OnNavigatedTo is fired when leaving a Modal page #16395

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some UI Test timings #19462
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19454
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, stale, Under Consideration

Updated

  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, .NET 8 SR2
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
